# TaskScribe LLMs.txt
# https://llmstxt.org/

> TaskScribe is a desktop application for audio and video transcription using 100% local AI. It provides total privacy by processing everything on your computer, with no data sent to the cloud.

## About TaskScribe

TaskScribe is a privacy-first transcription software that uses Faster-Whisper (OpenAI's Whisper model optimized for speed) to transcribe audio and video files locally on your computer. Key differentiators include:

- **100% Local Processing**: All transcription happens on your machine. No internet required.
- **Speaker Identification (Diarization)**: Automatically identifies and separates different speakers.
- **AI Task Extraction**: Optionally extract action items, decisions, and tasks using OpenAI, Google Gemini, or local Ollama.
- **Multi-format Support**: Import MP4, MKV, MOV, AVI, MP3, WAV, M4A. Export to TXT, Markdown, JSON, SRT.
- **GPU Acceleration**: NVIDIA CUDA support for up to 4x faster processing.
- **Privacy Compliant**: LGPD/GDPR compliant by design since no data leaves your device.

## Pricing

- **Free Plan**: 5 transcriptions per month, up to 60 minutes per file
- **Pro Plan**: $19/month or R$47/month - Unlimited transcriptions, AI task extraction, priority support

## Platform Availability

- Windows 10 or higher
- macOS 11 or higher (Intel and Apple Silicon)
- Linux (Ubuntu, Fedora, Debian via AppImage, .deb, .rpm)

## Key Features

### Transcription
- Powered by Faster-Whisper (4x faster than original Whisper)
- 99+ languages supported
- Automatic language detection
- 7 model sizes: tiny, base, small, medium, large-v2, large-v3, turbo
- Word-level timestamps

### Speaker Diarization
- Powered by PyAnnote
- Automatic participant detection
- Rename speakers with real names
- Color coding per speaker
- Speaking time statistics

### AI Task Extraction (Pro)
- GPT-4, Gemini, or Ollama (100% local)
- Meeting notes generation
- Action item checklists
- Executive summaries
- Custom AI prompts

### Export Options
- Plain text (TXT)
- Markdown (MD)
- JSON with timestamps
- SRT subtitles (YouTube ready)
- Export by specific speaker

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Do I need internet to use TaskScribe?
No! TaskScribe works 100% offline. Transcription is done locally. You only need internet to download the app and optionally for AI task extraction with OpenAI or Gemini.

### Is my data safe?
Yes. All data stays on your computer in the app's local folder. Nothing is sent to external servers. You have full control over your files.

### What audio/video formats are supported?
Import: MP4, MKV, MOV, AVI, WebM, MP3, WAV, M4A, AAC, FLAC. Export: TXT, MD, JSON, SRT.

### How many languages does it support?
Whisper supports 99+ languages including Portuguese, English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, and many others.

### Do I need a GPU?
No, it works with CPU too but will be slower. NVIDIA GPU with CUDA can make processing up to 4x faster.
